content: Tripod PMA 20 ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Accessories for measuring tools and scanners > Tripods- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatility – accessories help extend the range of applications for your line lasers Compatibility – designed for compatibility with all our line lasers Compact – foldable and portable design Applications Tripod PMA 20 – tripod for all line lasers Adaptor PMA 20 – adapts threads from 5/8 to 1/4 (5/8 ” internal thread at the bottom and a 1/4 ” external thread at the top) and fits all line, multi-axis, combination, and point lasers ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: PM 20-CG, PM 20-CG 12V, PM 2-L, PM 2-LG, PM 30-MG, PM 40-MG, PM 4-M, PMC 46 Additional Accessory Information: Compact tripod with 1/4” thread, extendable up to 1.2 m and fits neatly within the case PMA 62. The user is able to set up the system quickly anywhere on the jobsite.
